snippet.title: State of Anarchy: Master of Mayhem trailer
snippet.description:
'Master of Mayhem' is available on Steam:
http://store.steampowered.com/app/576130/

Your town is on fire! Anarchy reigns the streets! Aliens rampage in the sky! Somebody must stop this madness… It’s gonna be YOU! Fight your way through the burning streets, chase the aliens, hit their homeworld and escape in a stolen spaceship. YOU GOTTA TEACH’EM A LESSON!!!
